fields.name: road_link_id
fields.description: Conditionally Required. Foreign key  to  road_link table.

fields.name: segment_id
fields.description: Conditionally Required. Associated segment (Blank = lane traverses entire link) Foreign key (Segment table).

fields.name: allowed_uses
fields.description: Required. Set of allowed uses from Use_set: SHOULDER, PARKING, WALK, ALL, BIKE, AUTO, HOV2, HOV3, TRUCK, BUS, etc.

fields.name: r_barrier
fields.description: Optional. Whether a barrier exists to prevent vehicles from changing lanes to the right (default is None)

fields.name: l_barrier
fields.description: Optional. Whether a barrier exists to prevent vehicles from changing lanes to the left (default is None)
